data.title: Ike Turner & His Kings Of Rhythm
data.meta_description: Ike Turner & His Kings Of Rhythm are a pioneering American R&B group led by the legendary musician, Ike Turner. Formed in the 1950s, the group is known for their unique blend of blues, soul, and rock and roll, which helped shape the sound of modern music. With Ike’s dynamic guitar playing and soulful vocals, and the tight, energetic rhythms of his band, the Kings Of Rhythm have been influential in the development of popular music for decades. Their electrifying live performances and innovative studio recordings have solidified their place in music history and continue to inspire generations of musicians.
data.text:
Biography

Ike Turner & His Kings Of Rhythm are a pioneering American R&B group led by the legendary musician, Ike Turner. Formed in the 1950s, the group is known for their unique blend of blues, soul, and rock and roll, which helped shape the sound of modern music. With Ike’s dynamic guitar playing and soulful vocals, and the tight, energetic rhythms of his band, the Kings Of Rhythm have been influential in the development of popular music for decades. Their electrifying live performances and innovative studio recordings have solidified their place in music history and continue to inspire generations of musicians.
